post.summary: Export an existing drawing to BMP format with export settings specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filename of an input drawing on a storage.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Export BMP options passed as a JSON on a request body.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder with a drawing to process.

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed image).

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Your Aspose Cloud Storage name.

200.description: Data stream (if output path is not set).

400.description: Invalid request parameters or input data.

404.description: Input file doesn't exist at provided path.

500.description: Either current server is busy or internal error occured.

501.description: The specific operation is not yet supported - please, contact us if you require it.

put.summary:
Export drawing to BMP format. Drawing data is passed as zero-indexed multipart/form-data as well as export BMP options serialized as JSON.
Order of drawing data and BMP options could vary.

parameters.name: drawingData
parameters.description: Input drawing

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: JSON-serialized export options passed as zero-indexed multipart/form-data. Follow #/definitions/BmpOptionsDTO model definition.

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed image).

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Your Aspose Cloud Storage name.

200.description: Data stream (if output path is not set).

400.description: Invalid request parameters or input data.

500.description: Either current server is busy or internal error occured.

501.description: The specific operation is not yet supported - please, contact us if you require it.

CadRasterizationOptionsDTO.description: Cad Rasterization Options D T O

BorderX.description: Gets or sets the border X.

BorderY.description: Gets or sets the border Y.

PageHeight.description: Gets or sets the page height.

PageWidth.description: Gets or sets the page width.

BackgroundColor.description: Gets or sets a background color.

DrawColor.description: Gets or sets a foreground color.

ContentAsBitmap.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether content of a drawing is represented as image inside Pdf. Applicable only for CAD to Pdf export. Default is false.

GraphicsOptions.description: Gets or sets options to render bitmap inside pdf (if ContentAsBitmap is set to true).

VectorRasterizationOptionsDTO.description: Vector Rasterization Options D T O

DoPaletteCorrection.description: Determines whether to do auto-correction of a palette

IsPaletteSorted.description: Determines whether a palette is sorted

HasTrailer.description: Determines whether image has to have a trailer

Interlaced.description: Determines whether an image has to be interlaced

BitsPerPixel.description: Bits per pixel for resulting image

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of image.

Width.description: Gets or sets the width of image.

DwgProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWG properties.

DxfProperties.description: Gets or sets the DXF properties.

DwtProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWT properties.

DgnProperties.description: Gets or sets the DGN properties.

IfcProperties.description: Gets or sets the IFC properties.

IgsProperties.description: Gets or sets the IGS properties.

StlProperties.description: Gets or sets the STL properties.

DwfProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWF properties.
